channel.title: -CLIENT SIDED-Quest Tab Text Color Help!-
channel.description:
Coming to the Moparscape community for this one, i've looked all over the internet, html color codes don't work of course.
I'm attempting to get the basic color codes in the format their given. I can't seem to change :S
Mainly:
Red:0xff0000 Blue: ?? Green: ?? Black: ?? White: ??
Link: ?? :confused:
Please Help.
Here is what i am trying to edit: [IMG]http://i951.photobucket.com/albums/ad355/rspsman/Elite%20Demons%202011/Update.png[/img]
You can see the colors are 2 different types.
The first color, not the red one is the code: [code]0xFF981F[/code]
Now the red one is: [code]0xff0000[/code]
